import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import datetime
import os
import plotly.express as px
import plotly.graph_objects as go
from plotly.subplots import make_subplots
source.0790a23e:
fig=make_subplots(specs=[[{"secondary_y":False}]])
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=data['date'],y=data['births'].rolling(window=7).mean(),name='Birth'),secondary_y=False,)
fig.update_layout(autosize=False,width=700,height=500,title_text="Number of Birth in US")
fig.update_xaxes(title_text="Year")
fig.update_yaxes(title_text="Number",secondary_y=False)
fig.show()

fig=make_subplots(specs=[[{"secondary_y":False}]])
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=data1['month'],y=data1['births'],name='Birth'),secondary_y=False,)
fig.update_layout(autosize=False,width=700,height=500,title_text="Number of Births by Month in US")
fig.update_xaxes(title_text="month")
fig.update_yaxes(title_text="Number",secondary_y=False)
fig.show()
